title: What are accordion components?
description: Accordion components are UI elements that allow users to expand and collapse sections of content within a single page. Each section, known as a panel can be opened or closed independently. The primary purpose of an accordion is to organize and display large amounts of information in a compact and manageable way, enabling users to access specific content without being overwhelmed.

title: What they are used for?
description: Accordion components are used to organize and display content in a compact and user-friendly way. They are particularly useful in scenarios where you need to present a lot of information without overwhelming the user.

title: What are the type of accordion?
description: Accordion components come in different types, each designed to meet specific user interface needs, Single-Open Accordion, Multi-Open Accordion, Nested Accordion

title: Can I create an accordion component with a different framework?
description: Yes, you can absolutely create accordion components using a variety of frontend frameworks beyond React. Each framework offers its own tools and paradigms for building interactive UI elements like accordions
